short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Taobao items in browser directly
short.zh_CN: 在浏览器中一键搜索淘宝商品

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taobao Helper gives you quick access to Taobao, just click the extension's icon, input what you want to search, then click 'Search' or hit Enter key, you're all set. By the way, you can get coupons from Taobao and other providers along the way.
long.zh_CN:
淘宝助手为您提供最快捷的淘宝搜索服务，只要点击本扩展的图标，在弹出框中输入您要搜索的商品关键字，然后点击“搜索”或者按下回车就搞定了。
同时，您还可以领取淘宝和其他服务的优惠券哦~
